tuv.seg: An tUachtarán agus na Fórsaí Cosanta
The President of Ireland is Supreme Commander of the Irish Defence Forces
Is é/í Uachtarán na hÉireann an tArdcheannasaí ar Fhórsaí Cosanta na hÉireann
Officers in the Defence Forces hold commissions from the President
Is ón Uachtarán a fhaigheann oifigigh na bhFórsaí Cosanta a gcoimisiúin
Under the Defence Act of 1954, military command is exercised by the Irish Government through the Minister for Defence who manages and controls the forces
De réir Acht Cosanta na bliana 1954, is é Rialtas na hÉireann a riarann ceannasaíocht an airm tríd an Aire Cosanta a bhainistíonn agus a stiúraíonn na fórsaí
The Defence Forces in Ireland consist of:
Is iad na ranna atá i bhFórsaí Cosanta na hÉireann ná:
There is more information in our document on the Defence Forces
Tá tuilleadh eolais inár ndoiciméad ar Óglaigh na hÉireann
